plot: When a porcelain doll obsesses over her appearance, she thinks of nothing but looking perfect. But when she begins to see her broken image in the mirror, can she cover up the flaws of her inner self?
title: The Doll
plot_es: When a porcelain doll obsesses over her appearance, she thinks of nothing but looking perfect. But when she begins to see her broken image in the mirror, can she cover up the flaws of her inner self?
plot_en: When a porcelain doll obsesses over her appearance, she thinks of nothing but looking perfect. But when she begins to see her broken image in the mirror, can she cover up the flaws of her inner self?
